title: Thurs Post Show (10-27-22)
itunes:title: Thurs Post Show (10-27-22)
description:
Nobody won the power ball last night again. A man who was arrested for pouring bleach into a co-worker’s Pepsi. A man was arrested who taped cellphone underneath ex’s car. Mattress Mack may get one of the biggest sports payouts in betting history. Eddie got asked to be a keynote speaker at a radio event. But it’s for show prep…and that doesn’t make Lunchbox happy. Abby wants to defend herself after getting the tea spilled on her yesterday.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
